To ratxhet: why would you download the sample when it says the Chinese subtitles are there. The quality of the movie may be good but if you don't like hard coded subs viewing the sample is not going to change anything.
It would be nice if the people who upload movies with hard subs include that fact in the beginning. the same goes for Cams, include details in beginning please it would be much appreciated.
